data.message: saying you were his biggest fan and then calling him a sell out 😂🤣😂 who tf you been listening to since 99. This IS shady. This is what he’s been doing from the jump. But now your feelings are hurt so he a sell out. Gtfoh. For as many fans as you think he lost he gained 2 more who weren’t.

replies.message: FACTS just a bunch a fake fans. Am glad he did what he did at least we know who the real fans are.

This is the truth.
